name: Snail Survival
description:
Snail Survival is a short, 2D, Side-scrolling shoot-em up about a flying snail on an adventure to collect some food.

WASD to move. 

Space to Shoot.

ESC to Quit.

This is one of my earliest assignments from my second year of university, but I'm still fond of it and how it turned out despite how much more I've learnt since making it.
